import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import './header.styles.scss' import {ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../images/header.svg' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {auth} from '../../FireBase/firebase.utils' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN )}
); } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }); export default connect(mapStateToProps,null)(Header);
